name: WWII Tanks: Battlefield
description:
Immerse yourself in a world of armored tank battles. Choose from a wide range of famous tanks of
the major combatants. Pick the best tank and blast your way across the battlefield. Defeat your enemies
with force and strategic decisions! And lead your team on a glorious road to victory!
Game Features:
Wide selection of famous WWII tanks:Germany: Tiger 1 Panzer-IV Sdkfz251 Mörser KarlUSSR: T-34/76 T-34/85 KV-I KV-II BT-7 T-35Japan: Type 89United Kingdom: Cromwell Sherman Fireflyand many more.Missions:Battle of Stalingrad - AttackBattle of Stalingrad - DefenseEscort Mission - BerlinEscort Mission - Berlin (General)Battle of Kursk - AxisBattle of Kursk - AlliedSpeed Battle - BerlinEscape from Berlin
